bibl.title: Roman Alexandria. Studies in its Social History.
bibl.note: Diss. Columbia Univ. Summary in DA 47 (1986-1987) p. 277-A. - Applies quantitative methods to reassess the status designations commonly associated with Alexandrian citizenship. - Appendix: Prosopography of Alexandrian Greeks in Egypt from Augustus to Diocletian.
bibl.seg: Delia Diana, Roman Alexandria. Studies in its Social History.

Diss. Columbia Univ. Summary in DA 47 (1986-1987) p. 277-A. - Applies quantitative methods to reassess the status designations commonly associated with Alexandrian citizenship. - Appendix: Prosopography of Alexandrian Greeks in Egypt from Augustus to Diocletian.
